title: Cover, 19th century
medium:
Medium: linen
Technique: needlework on knotted net
description: Two lengths of linen with an inset border at one end of embroidered knotted netting. Embroidery is a repeating floral unit based on square guard bands of pulled work. Fringed gauze woven band at very end.

tombstone.epitaph:
Cover, 19th century.Medium: linen
Technique: needlework on knotted net. 1972-81-4.
